website_summaries.verdict: A lower-priced peel made of stainless steel that's super easy to store.
pros: The stainless steel portion is very durable, easy to wipe clean, and generously sized
Handle folds so the peel takes up less room in storage
Thin edge makes handling thin crust pies a cinch
cons: The handle is poorly attached to the paddle portion

customer_reviews.title: Durability may be an issue
customer_reviews.text: Bolt broke after only a couple of uses and now I cannot tighten or loosen the arm.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Very handy and just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I use it all the time for building the pizza on, and then transferring it into the oven. Inside the oven I have the cast iron pizza pan which is preheating getting hot already so the pizza cooks on that, and when it's done I use hot pads and remove the cast iron pan. It stays hot a while after coming out of the oven, so the pizza stays on that, and I cut right on that cast iron pan. But this is a nice tool for building the pizza on and getting it onto that pan. It's very large with the handle extended but I store it with the handle folded in.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PUT IN THE DISHWASHER!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT PUT IN THE DISHWASHER! :-X It clearly states this on the back of the package, but I did not see it prior to use the first time. It worked amazing and the pizzas slid right off onto my steel, but after washing it didn't provide the same non stick surface. I really like the way it folds down into a functional size. I can't blame them for my negligence.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

customer_reviews.title: No more burned wrists!!
customer_reviews.text: I am now elderly. Getting a pizza (homemade) into and out of the oven was getting harder all the time. I could get it into the oven, most of the time. But, I had to ask my son, who moved in with me to care for me, to get it out of the oven. I hate to do that as I am quite independent. When I saw the pizza peels on Amazon, I quickly got the Pomodoro peel. It had great reviews and had a ridge on the back to hold the pizza on the peel. I used it for the first time this week and I love it. No more burned wrists on me or my son!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Williams

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for cooking a pizza in my oven with my pizza steel. I sometimes have to work a bit of flour under the dough to get my pizza to slide off but that is my only complaint. Not sure if a wood peel would alleviate that issue. I do like the thinness of steel and the ability to rotate the handle is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: K. Brady

customer_reviews.title: Not dishwasher safe. Inconvenient to store away
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT dishwasher safe. The fault is mine for purchasing this instead of looking for a different product, but I figured in this day and age, this sort of stuff should be a given, so I didn't even bother checking if it was dishwasher safe. That's like checking if a cooking utensils is food grade, no one thinks twice about this. But this reflects on the quality and usefulness of the product which I rate really low. Also, the fact that you need to unscrew it to be able to store it away makes it even more inconvenient of a product. So I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: It makes storage so easy. I've been intending to get a peel for ...
customer_reviews.text: The most convenient thing is the swiveling handle. I'm sure you must hear that frequently. It makes storage so easy. I've been intending to get a peel for some time now, and I'm glad to have one that I am this happy with. The least convenient thing is the lack of an assembly diagram, or even a picture. I spent some time figuring out which way the handle attached. It became a family affair, but we figured it out. I have pizza here when the grandcdhildren come to visit. I've used the peel three times already, and am very pleased with it. Diane Stefane Boonville, IN
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: His family love a good pizza so will have fun making pizza ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchases this as a gift for my son's birthday and he likes it, His family love a good pizza so will have fun making pizza at home and this pizza peel will make it so easy to do. It is made very well and is foldable so easy to store without taking so much room. I did quite a bit of searching for the best pizza peel and this looks to be it. I also liked that it is in a box so nice to wrap and give as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Maydole

customer_reviews.title: Go all wood, avoid this one
customer_reviews.text: Every time I used it the dough would get stuck to the peel no matter how much flower or corn meal I used to prepare. The removable handle was also not cut properly and did not line up with the edge of the metal sheet never allowing a true firm fit. I have since ordered a Wooden Pizza Peel and am much happier with the results already. It was easy to clean though, so bonus points for that I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cracked on Third Usage
customer_reviews.text: The third time I used this stone I found it cracked into two parts in an "S" shape right under the pizza, in the oven. I was able to save the pizza. I did NOT soak this stone. It really doesn't get clean, but you just have to scrape it off a bit. I was careful with the temperature as well. Disappointed, as I know the business where it was made in Ohio. Been shopping their products for decades. The big spatula is just OK. Made in China, I think.
customer_reviews.author: Red Star

customer_reviews.title: Prepare for spam after you order
customer_reviews.text: The product was fine but then I started getting follow up emails. "How did you like this product?" It was ok, but I dont need the spam
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Clinkenbeard

customer_reviews.title: Just Right
customer_reviews.text: My order came very quickly. The peel is very sturdy - doesn’t seem like it will warp or collapse under a heavy load of, say, 10 grain bread. I love that the handle folds out of the way for storage. It also has a loop if you’d prefer to hang it. I’m happy with the way the handle is easy to extend or fold. I don’t see the problem that others have mentioned, but then maybe I’m easier to please than some. This is exactly the product I wanted. I’m very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Drew

customer_reviews.title: Great Pizza Peel and Easy Storage
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet, but have put it together, folded the handle, and stored in upright in a cabinet. Nice! It seems to be the perfect size for homemade pizza and store-bought frozen pizzas. If you order a large pizza from a restaurant, or a 'take and bake' like those sold at Costco, this pizza peel may be too small. The size of your pizzas will determine the size you want for a pizza peel.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to clean and works well
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a wood fired pizza oven and needed a pizza slider. The one that came with our pizza oven was bulky and did not fit anywhere. This one can actually fold the handle in which majes it more convenient for storage. Have used this multiple times and it is not loose or unsturdy. It cleans easy, packs away nicely and works well with moving pizzas in and out of the oven.
customer_reviews.author: Cpronzato

customer_reviews.title: mildew smell
customer_reviews.text: The actual product seems well made. However, when I went to use it, I noticed a mildew smell from the box. Even the plastic shrink-wrap covering the blade the scoop is smelly, but the blade itself is okay. Not so for the finished wooden handle. So far, vinegar has not worked. Now I have to try other methods suggested by the Internet. I am highly allergic to molds and avoid mildew smells. If I can remove the smell, I will keep the item.
customer_reviews.author: Ro81

customer_reviews.title: Convenience is key, easy to store and clean, also very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Even though the handle is easily detachable, this feels solid in your hand. I haven't had any problems sliding a pie into the iven, or pulling something out. The detachable handle is great as you can just unscrew the finger nut, and put the aluminum into the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Burg of Madison

customer_reviews.title: Mildew Smell
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a good peel and I'm sure it would have worked fine, but I am having to return it. As soon as I opened the box I was hit with a strong mildew smell, like the smell old books have. It was coming from the wood handle. I tried washing it, but it did not help. I have mildew allergies and reacted as soon as I opened it. I checked reviews and found some others that stated the same thing. Not sure if it is from where it was stored or what.
customer_reviews.author: Brea

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific tool. I do not use it for pizza but for bread. The quality is great, it is sturdy and looks wonderful. I don't know how people have had issues. Flour or parchment so items don't stick and don't screw the handle tightly like you're working on a car... common sense is not a flower that grows in everyone's garden.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great product, works great and stores easy
customer_reviews.text: I have a Rokboxx pizza oven. The provided pizza thingy had slots in it so when you flour it some of it falls right thru. This product is great, solid and stores easy (you can fold the handle in)
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: 4 1/2 star product.  Just one slight imperfection..
customer_reviews.text: It really deserves 4 1/2 stars, but won’t let me do that...Overall, this is a very good product. It is very sturdy and easy to use and I love that the handle moves to make storage easy. The only drawback that I have found is that because the handle does move, I can’t tighten it down well enough to prevent it from moving slightly while using. But, that is not going to stop me from using and really liking this peel.
customer_reviews.author: Sar328

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended and stores well
customer_reviews.text: This works as intended for removing cooked pizzas from oven and/or moving cooking pizzas around to make sure they are evenly heated in the oven. Thin but very durable metal, great center pivot screw and smooth handle. Stores nicely due to the handle folding in on itself. I wish I had this long ago!
customer_reviews.author: Jaimielaura

customer_reviews.title: Weak and potentially breakable knob
customer_reviews.text: I just received this item and I have found problems. The metalic nut inside the knob unscrewed it and came out of it. I had to screw it back with an Allen tool and I have the feeling that the knob is really weak and it might break apart anytime. I have not returned it, just because of the high shipping cost. Regarding the aluminum plate, it is acceptable. Overall, I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Tio Jo

customer_reviews.title: Lower quality craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.text: Clever space saving design, but the quality on this was pretty low. The wood handle was cut in such a way that the lip on the wood didn't quite align with the metal handle when extended. Still, does the job.
customer_reviews.author: CountVonCount

customer_reviews.title: Easy to slide homemade pizza and made very well
customer_reviews.text: We bought a pizza oven and the pan that came with it didn’t have a long handle so it was hard to turn pizza while in the fire. But with this one it is perfect! Being that my husband is Italian and can be picky he gives it 5 stars as well!! Very easy to clean and since the handle can fold down storage is no problem as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Secco

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy good quality
customer_reviews.text: I overall love this. I don’t have room for a big ole thing to shove somewhere I love the folding. I might be picky here but I will say I anticipated it to be less “work” to unscrew or screw meaning you can’t just give it a turn. You really have to turn it a lot before collapsing. It’s not a big deal and you only do it once when using. Just didn’t expect. It’s veru sturdy and glad I purchased it. Used once and was lovely
customer_reviews.author: Brian T

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, small enough for Uuni 3.
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought me the Uuni 3 pizza oven for Christmas and we wanted a second peel that would fit in the oven. This one was exactly as pictures. Assembled with no tools in less than 30 seconds and works well with the oven. A little bulkier than the Uuni peel, with the large wooden handle but that’s probably preferred by most people. We also made a spot to hang it in the kitchen so it doubles as neat pizza decor. Cleans up easily. Five stars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The design is very good, well engineered
customer_reviews.text: The design is very good, well engineered. But the manufacture does not produce the product as designed. The wood handle will not fit the metal parts well without some carving. The wood is very high quality and hard, probably oak. Therefore it takes about an hour to carve to fit the metal parts. Otherwise it would get a 5.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Just a great pizza peel
customer_reviews.text: The build quality seems to be above average. The pivoting handle locks into place very securely. The aluminum ( peel ) appears to be a good grade of metal, and not flimsy. I did not give it 5 stars for durability because I have only used it a few times. As of now I feel this peel will be with me for many years. The foldable handle is great for storage. It fits in right next to my cutting boards.
customer_reviews.author: alfred amendola

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made and flexible.
customer_reviews.text: Well made and good that there is a foldable handle. Would have like the wooden handle notch would also lay flat when turned in, just like when it is extended. Seems like an oversight. Looks a bit lumpy to be stuck on the peel ledge for where knob/screw sits. Took off handle when I used it to flip over bread dough and place in bread cloche.
customer_reviews.author: Goldiemom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Crispy-Crusted Pizza
customer_reviews.text: Delivered the next day, my husband says it works like a dream. We did have the perfect, crispy-crusted pizza last night.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Cremeans

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Works great is not dishwasher safe put mine in dishwasher metal came out all strange looking you have to unscrew the handle bit to fold it over and even the it takes up more room then if you take it apart it's a great novelty item
customer_reviews.author: Keff87

customer_reviews.title: Directions might be helpful.
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my daughter in law who is the pizza maker in the family along with some pizza stones. Her first try was a bit of a disaster as she couldn’t get the pizza from the peel to the stone. I guess there is a learning curve. Some directions with the product might have been helpful. The product itself is beautiful and well made, just most likely user error. She is trying again Friday. Will update.
customer_reviews.author: Pmoore

customer_reviews.title: Some assembly required
customer_reviews.text: Before you buy this you must be able to screw in a light bulb. The way this goes together couldn't be any easier. There's only the handle and aluminum pan and a bolt and nut knob. You do have to push on the bolt when tightening the hand knob. (There is plenty of room to turn it) The handle is quite wide which makes it easier to support the weight of the Pizza. It looks great and It should move pizzas fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Could not take the screw apart to even start putting the handle on
customer_reviews.text: First, couldn't get the screw apart to put the handle on, my husband had to use tools. Then, the handle does not fit tightly. Also can't get it undone enough to fold the handle down so have to store it as a whole assembly. Since I'm only using for bread I will keep it, but if I had to put any weight on it I would be out of luck, it's very flimsy and since the handle wobbles around because the screw can't be tightened very well after we got it put together, I'm no real happy with what I spent on it. It's easy enough to clean, that's about the best thing I can say for it.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Best Value and stores easily
customer_reviews.text: Now have a way to cook a home made pizza correctly. A little more trouble than just throwing a pizza in the oven but for us worth it. Using this peel with parchment paper on a stone works really well.
customer_reviews.author: markp

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for getting pizza out of oven
customer_reviews.text: I had put off buying one of these for a long time because two spatulas got the job done. I make pizza on my pizza stone frequently, and this makes it soooo much easier to get out of the oven. I love that it folds in half for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa A. Olsson

customer_reviews.title: I love this peel
customer_reviews.text: I love this peel. I've used it when baking French bread on an Old Stone. Before first use, I tapered the leading edge and smoothed all of the other edges. I will make French bread at least once a week with a future goal of a couple pizzas.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: It‘s terrible and will crush hours of hard work.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy! Unless you dump massive amounts of flour on top of it, your pizza will stick. Go with wood, trust me. This product is beyond frustrating because of the steps it takes; only to be destroyed by the fact that your pizza will not detach from this peel.
customer_reviews.author: Analog Style

customer_reviews.title: Easy and convenient
customer_reviews.text: We have started making our own custom gourmet pizzas....this pizza peel is ideal. Previously we fought the rack droop and tore some crusts....this just makes it easy. Really like the fold down handle to store. All in all we are glad we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Grip
customer_reviews.text: Only thing we didn't care for was the large handle..my husband has large hands and he thought it was too large and made it a little awkward to use...he's going to shave it down a little...for me it was way too wide for me to use. Other than that..we liked it
customer_reviews.author: Barbara L.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$$
customer_reviews.text: This pizza peel is so easy to use. It removes any pizza very easily from the oven. The handle can be rotated so that its easy to store. Wipe clean and done
customer_reviews.author: Vpk873

customer_reviews.title: Smells
customer_reviews.text: I’m returning this item as it has a musty/moldy smell. Could just be a fluke. I can’t attest to how it works as I did not even attempt to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary R

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pizza peel
customer_reviews.text: Love this pizza peel. Not too big, yet not too small. Cleans off well and the handle can be taken off for easy storage or dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: S. Slattery

customer_reviews.title: GOOD STUFF
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. How hard can it be to scoop up a pizza? The price is right.
customer_reviews.author: James D Henry

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and great for the outdoor grill.
customer_reviews.text: This peel is perfect for our grill. We like to cook outside and for the pizza on the grill one needs a great peel. This is it. However... the handle is retractable but appears to have the groove on the wrong side, so that it doesn't lie flat. It would store so much easier with a flat handle.
customer_reviews.author: Gurleymon

customer_reviews.title: I’d recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure if it would be too flexible or if it has some rigidity to it, after receiving it and putting the handle together, I tested it and it’s got enough rigidity to it and won’t flex a whole lot, it will pick up a hot 12” to 14” pizza with ease, the folding handle is a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M. Babila

customer_reviews.title: Just about perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This "Pizza Peel" is exactly what I had in mind when I ordered it. Well made, durable, top of the line in all aspects. I recommend it to all pizza "purists"!
customer_reviews.author: Zi

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty nice.
customer_reviews.text: This did everything it was supposed to do and had a very sturdy and convenient design. It didn't bend or get flimsily when picking up the pizza, and is a great size for handling different types of "pies."
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Pizza Peel
customer_reviews.text: I am going to attempt to make my own home made pizzas, pita breads and flat breads on my new pizza stone and chose your pizza peel because it is durable, easy to clean and easy to store with the fold able handle.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My first time making homemade pizza. A friend told me to buy a pizza peel. I am thinking WTH is that. If you have a pizza stone, you, you need this product. Works great and love that I can turn the handle inwards for storage!
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Price
customer_reviews.text: This metal pizza peel was exactly what I wanted and needed for our new outdoor pizza oven! Very happy with this product and would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Chef Pomodoro Pizza Peel
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the Chef Pomodoro pizza peel. I actually bought it for my husband for Father’s Day, but I couldn’t wait and gave it to him early. He loves it and is very happy with it!! Very sturdy and nicely made!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nifty

customer_reviews.title: Handle needed to be adjusted.
customer_reviews.text: I had to make the notch in the handle deeper for it to lock in place. Otherwise product is what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: M. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Pizza Peel
customer_reviews.text: This is the Pizza Peel to get ! Perfect for my little Pizza Oven . Originally ordered another brand and landed up returning it for this.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Ann Rees

customer_reviews.title: Great pizza peel
customer_reviews.text: Great pizza peel. Works good with my two new pizza stones. The folding handle allows me to store it in the same drawer as my stones. I recommend this item to all who love to make their own pizza.
customer_reviews.author: gkyle

customer_reviews.title: Nice pizza peel
customer_reviews.text: I use this with my Uuni pizza oven. It's a much better peel than the one that comes with the Uuni. Nice handle that flips around to save space for storage. Overall it's nicely designed and rugged.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, clean and store. Definitely coat with flour or cornmeal before placing pizza on the surface so that it does not stick.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Braganza

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for his birthday. He loves it. He says it's the next best thing to sliced bread. He eats pizza about 3 days a week.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my UUNI
customer_reviews.text: Got an UUNI Pizza Oven for Christmas and it's great, but it came with a tray that had no handle. This was the perfect solution and since the handle closes down, it fits in the oven for storage. If you get an UUNI, get one of these too.
customer_reviews.author: pantysue

customer_reviews.title: Great Pizza Peel
customer_reviews.text: This pizza peel is just what I needed. It's easy to use and easy to store. It works great with pizza, boston butts and even 14 lb briskets.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Dumas

customer_reviews.title: It's Good to Go
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for the Bertello. Get two, you'll need them. Stores well with the folding handle.
customer_reviews.author: HoosierD

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Works well and packaged in a "to go Pizza box". Nice touch. East sliding using 50/50 mix of flour and course corn meal. Handle fold nicely for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Jeepster

customer_reviews.title: Works well for high heat pizza oven
customer_reviews.text: Works really well for rotating and transferring pizza to and from our Green mountain Grill pizza oven!
customer_reviews.author: Jena Landers

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my son, so I’m guessing on the review. It looked great and arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Josie P. Little

customer_reviews.title: Pizza time!
customer_reviews.text: After using this the first time, I couldn't think of making pizzas without it. Makes pizza baking so much easier and is compact sturdy and easy to store and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: The fold in the aluminum part makes the handle a little bit higher and therefore easier to place in and out of the oven.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Leite

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my husband as an early Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: And he really likes it. Sturdy and he likes that it folds up and doesn't take up so much space
customer_reviews.author: joannj

customer_reviews.title: Works great and easy to store
customer_reviews.text: Does its job just fine while being very easy to store because it’s collapsible. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: We make a lot of homemade pizza and use a stone in the oven. This makes it so much easier when transferring the done pizza out and putting in the next one!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Friesen

customer_reviews.title: Large and difficult handle.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t like at all. To store it you need to unscrew the wood handle and turn it around then tighten the screw to hold it in place. It’s really too large-the handle itself is half the length of the pizza slider. I thought it was a one piece utensil. Guess I didn’t read it correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the purchase. Save your money!
customer_reviews.text: We found this item did not last long. After 4 to 5 uses we found the screw had loosened and couldn’t get the handle to stay attached to the metal peel. The screw could be screwed into the knob itself but If you added the handle and peel it doesn’t thread. We ordered a wooden peel.
customer_reviews.author: Sary K. Newman

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as I would like
customer_reviews.text: Was a decent purchase but not as large or as sturdy as I would have liked.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Hakola

customer_reviews.title: Folding handle is very convenient for storage
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Since the handle is made to fold down with a simple loosing of the bolt and nut, I was also able to make a longer handle for my deep pizza oven.
customer_reviews.author: L. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Well made, sturdy. Makes removing very safe and easy from a very hot oven.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Love this, makes it easier to remove the pizza from the pizza maker
customer_reviews.author: Kodee Wignall

customer_reviews.title: Fire up the Oven
customer_reviews.text: Great quality - way to assemble, sturdy handle— perfect making awesome pizzas
customer_reviews.author: Robert K Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold up.
customer_reviews.text: Used a few times and now the knob no longer tightens. It just sort of slides off the bolt. Given the reviews I’m surprised I’m having issues.
customer_reviews.author: Yeti Pharmer

customer_reviews.title: Folding handle plus metal surface makes this a superior pizza peel
customer_reviews.text: The folding handle is what makes this work so well. Also, because it is metal rather than wood, pizzas slide easily for safe placement or retrieval from the oven. Easy to store because of the folding handle.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to fold and unfold, easy to clean, perfect size for oven or grill!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Quality seems cheap
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a Mario Batali pizza peel years ago which was great and currently not available on Amazon. This one just feels cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Groove

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I think it is pretty Ok. Not unbelievable, pizza still stick a little, but I am ordering another. Very important if you want to make Multiple pies.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: works good
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with the functionality of the Pizza Peel. It can fold up nicely, or stay extended. Works well in the pizza oven. My only issue was that it was delivered already broken. The knob for the handle to the peel was split and wouldn't tighten. But we didn't want to deal with waiting on a return/exchange so we super glued the knob and that seemed to work for now.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi R

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected, would bye again.
customer_reviews.text: foldable means you can easily take the handle off, spin it 90 degrees and put it back on for easy storage. And that works just fine for me. Very good pizza pizza peel that i can fit into my lower cabinet with the pizza stone.
customer_reviews.author: John McLennan

customer_reviews.title: Looks good; wish I could put it together
customer_reviews.text: It looks like a quality product. I just cannot figure out how to remove the bolt from the handle to install on the pizza peel.
customer_reviews.author: Fionnbharr

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! Bought for my boyfriend for Christmas but we couldn't wait to open it and try it out with our new pizza stone! Made the process so much easier and it's just such a fantastic product.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: compact and strong
customer_reviews.text: This is a great peel.. Good for a small personal pizza.. Love that the handle can tuck away for storage
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Handles works as designed, seems pretty sturdy. Only used it once, but it worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: T. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: So easy
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it. So much easier than using a pan and oven mitts!!
customer_reviews.author: steem

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Yes. Yes. Yes. I’ve been wanting this ever since I started making my own pizzas. Just flour the surface and it’ll do everything you need.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Rasku

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Pizza Peel
customer_reviews.text: So...the engineering behind a pizza peel is not like building the Hoover Dam...but..it's got a lovely wood handle that easily can "collapse" for storage if need be...and the peel itself is slim and can swoop under your pizza pies and snatch them off your stone like a magician ripping a table cloth from under fully set table. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: dannyBcookin

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my husband who is into making homemade bread. The peel works exactly as expected. Cleans easily and love the ability to fold up the handle for easy/compact storage.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri L. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Quality is top notch. Removable handle for cleaning and rotates for storage.
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was a little larger, but that's my own doing - could have purchased a larger size. Nice that the handle is removable for cleaning, and foldable for storage. Solid and functions quite well; definitely recommend owning.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Loved the peel
customer_reviews.text: Loved the peel, but the wooden knob broke on the 4th time we used it. Is there a place to get replacement knobs, or has it been safe to glue it together? Other than that, would have given it a 5.
customer_reviews.author: John Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Recommended Pizza Peel
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have with pizza. Large and somewhat cumbersome, it still deposits and recovers pizza with ease to/from a hot stone. Recommend. Large in size, the handle does fold away for storage.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Strong enough, thin enough
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good! My most recent pizza was stuck to the pan like cement and I was able to get under and chip to get it loose with this peel.
customer_reviews.author: George Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: While I originally liked the look of this peel, it wouldn't assemble properly. The screw was too short and the aluminum knob was partially stripped so they wouldn't connect and tighten with the handle in place. Going with a different style.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Karr

customer_reviews.title: Handle won't fold 180
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that the handle won't totally fold 180 degrees but not a bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Angela B

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I like this item and I make my own pizza a lt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No quality control? Bad experience
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived mine home, and it was scratched and dented. No thanks
customer_reviews.author: Very Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: heat
customer_reviews.text: I loaded it up with ashed over charcoal as full as I could get it and left the access door cover in place as directed. Infrared thermometer read 550 degrees F. I'm not sure how some of the reviewers got 900F. Nuclear fuel perhaps
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Chef Pomodoro Aluminum Metal Pizza Peel with Foldable Wood Handle for Easy Storage 12-Inch x 14-Inch, Gourmet Luxury Pizza Paddle for Baking Homemade Pizza Bread
product_meta.description:
Summary

POMODORO's Aluminum Metal Pizza Peel with Foldable Wooden Handle was crafted specifically for the pizza maker, home chef and artisan baker. Designed with function and practicality in mind, the aluminum metal is made from commercial grade aluminum for durability and withstanding high temperatures. With an 11-inch foldable wooden handle, it can easily be folded inward to save space, making it easy to store. The paddle is a perfect match for any kitchen décor, gourmet pizza parlor and bakery. It's incredible strength prevents warping and subdues heat from transferring pizza and baked goods to and from an oven/grill.

Use

Use POMODORO's Aluminum Pizza Peel to transfer pizzas, bread and other baked goods to and from the oven, outdoor grill and wood fired ovens. 




 1. Turn the wood knob to loosen the screw and turn handle 180°. Firmly tighten the handle prior to use.
 2. Sprinkle with flour, cornmeal or milled wheat bran to allow the pizza, bread and baked goods to slide easily onto the peel.
 3. Carefully place onto a pizza stone, baking sheet or tray with the peel
 4. Once finished cooking, slide out the pizza, bread or baked goods from the oven using the peel
 5. Mmmm, enjoy and serve!



Care Instructions


 * Hand wash in warm, soapy water. Scrap off any excess food or crumbs from the peel using a soft sponge. Dry immediately.
 * Do not soak or use abrasive scrubbers. Not dishwasher safe
 * Once you are finished cleaning, loosen the wood knob and turn handle inward for storage.



With a small footprint of 12-inch x 14-inch, POMODORO’s Aluminum Metal Pizza Peel is the perfect all-purpose pizza peel!

Materials:
Metal Peel: Commercial-Grade Aluminum
Wooden Knob + Handle: All Natural Pine Wood

Measurement:
12-inch x 25-inch (fully extended)
12-inch x 14-inch (folded)
feature_bullets: ✅ Aluminum Head with Foldable Wooden Handle, measuring 12-inch wide by 14-inch long with a 10-inch foldable handle. Total length when fully extended is 24-inch long
✅ Made of commercial grade aluminium and all natural pine wood, the Aluminum Metal Pizza Peel Paddle is the perfect tool and companion in baking and cooking pizzas, bread, pastries and more!

✅ Transfer pizzas, delicate breads, cakes, pies, pastries into an oven, wood fired oven or grill to keep from burning your baker's hand from the oven or from the hot baked goods. Perfect as a cake lifter
✅ Foldable design for extremely easy storage, capable to fit in any kitchen size; in a house, restaurant, apartment or condo!

✅ With a safety backstep, this peel is designed perfectly for lifting pizzas, or cake sheets out of the oven, the Metal Pizza Paddle is a must have for any baker and pizza chef. Compatible with Uuni 3, most commercial pizza ovens and accessories, Pizzeria Pronto, Green Egg, Mastercraft!
